goal: dry-run stub plan with deterministic phases

steps.description: Inspect repository structure and identify likely impact area
steps.acceptance: A short impact-focused analysis is present in the response

steps.description: Apply one minimal code or config change tied to the goal
steps.acceptance: At least one file edit is described with expected impact
Validation outcome is explicitly reported (pass/fail with reason)

steps.description: Summarize changes, tradeoffs, and next recommendation
steps.acceptance: Summary includes outcomes, risks, and next step proposal
